Journal Story: I've had a couple of friends who previously thru hiked who intrigued my interest in the trail. Living in D.C. and at a computer desk for the last 6 years has allowed for the intrigue to grow to an interest and passion. I'm looking forward to this journey and the new challenges it brings.
I had planned to start hiking in April but with the passing of both my grandmothers in the past 3 months, I decided to delay.
Quitting, moving, and getting my paperwork together has been more daunting than anticipated. Last few days before I start.
